FuncDef: The display ospf request-queue command displays the OSPF request list. The display ospf request-queue command displays the OSPF request list.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an OSPF process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Specifies the type of an interface.
-

The router ID of a neighbor.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.
